name: Bamboo Pole
description: A simple bamboo pole. It has no special effects but gets the job done.

name: Ironwood Caster
description: A sturdy rod reinforced with ironwood. Increases Strength.

name: Fortune's Whim
description: A rod that feels lucky in your hands. Increases Luck.

name: Archaeologist's Rod
description: Equipped with sensors for ancient materials. Increases Relic rarity weight.

name: Gilded Seeker
description: A luxurious rod that seems to attract gold. Increases Treasure Chest rarity weight.

name: River Rod
description: A specialized rod crafted for the Tinker River. Increases XP gained while fishing here.
